context_bundle.summary: Playwright browser automation framework (Microsoft). Cross-browser (Chromium, Firefox, WebKit), fast (DevTools Protocol), built-in auto-waiting, parallel execution. Modern alternative to Selenium. 3M+ weekly downloads.

onboarding.quick_start: Playwright = modern web automation. Supports Chrome/Firefox/WebKit. Auto-waits for elements. Test isolation via browser contexts. Fast DevTools Protocol. Use Page Object Model for maintainability.
common_patterns: Auto-waiting: await page.click('button') waits for clickable
Test isolation: Each test gets fresh browser context
Page Object Model: Encapsulate page interactions

known_errors.cause: Selector incorrect or element not rendered
known_errors.solution: Verify selector with page.locator().count(), check for dynamic loading
known_errors.prevention: Use robust selectors (data-testid), explicit waits if needed
